products.name: Synix 32E1M, 32 Inches - LED TV, I-cast, INBUILT DECORDER.
products.information: About Syinix is a Japan-based professional home appliance brand. Since its foundation, it adheres to its ultimate goal of making people’s lifes smarter and better. With its distinct Japanese design style, Syinix continuously pursues innovative functional designs with everyday products. Make an order for this Syinix 32-Inch LED TV online at Jumia and have it delivered to you in no time.

products.name: iphone X

reviews.review: The phone is serving me right. Thank you
Never though apple products were this good
I would give the phone a 5 star rating if it was dual sim
